blogPost.excerpt: Boost your influence by understanding your followers, automating your engagement, and categorizing your audience. Deliver them highly personalized and targeted content with our award-winning interactive content templates.
blogPost.body: Boost your influence by understanding your followers, automating your engagement, and categorizing your audience. Deliver them highly personalized and targeted content with our award-winning interactive content templates.
blogPost.title: Microinfluence - Take your influencer engagement to the next level
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 通过了解您的追随者、自动化您的参与以及对您的受众进行分类来提升您的影响力。通过我们屡获殊荣的交互式内容模板，为他们提供高度个性化和针对性的内容。
localize.tagline: 让您的影响者参与度更上一层楼

localize.description: 通過了解您的追隨者、自動化您的參與以及對您的受衆進行分類來提升您的影響力。通過我們屢獲殊榮的交互式內容模板，爲他們提供高度個性化和針對性的內容。
localize.tagline: 讓您的影響者參與度更上一層樓

previous.excerpt: Following the previously successful model SK61, EPOMAKER has made some improvements based on real customer feedback. Thus we designed this new AK61/AK61S with a custom Mac layout and functions for Mac users.
previous.title: Epomaker AK61 - A programmable mechanical keyboard with 61 keys

localize.description: 在之前成功的SK61型号之后，EPOMAKER根据真实的客户反馈进行了一些改进。因此，我们为Mac用户设计了这款带有自定义Mac布局和功能的新AK61/AK61S。
localize.tagline: 一种61键的可编程机械键盘

localize.description: 在之前成功的SK61型號之後，EPOMAKER根據真實的客戶反饋進行了一些改進。因此，我們爲Mac用戶設計了這款帶有自定義Mac佈局和功能的新AK61/AK61S。
localize.tagline: 一種61鍵的可編程機械鍵盤

next.excerpt: RecipeCart is a free extension that immediately shows you the recipe in a ready-for-print format. Print, save, or send the recipe to your phone. Under the hood, we use ML to identify exact ingredients + amounts for export to Instacart or Amazon Fresh.
next.title: Recipe Cart Chrome Extension - Instantly see recipe or order ingredients on any recipe site

localize.description: RecipeCart是一个免费的扩展，它可以立即以可供打印的格式向您显示食谱。打印、保存或将食谱发送到您的手机。在幕后，我们使用ML来确定出口到Insta或Amazon Fresh的确切配料+数量。
localize.tagline: 在任何食谱网站上即时查看食谱或订购食材

localize.description: RecipeCart是一個免費的擴展，它可以立即以可供打印的格式向您顯示食譜。打印、保存或將食譜發送到您的手機。在幕後，我們使用ML來確定出口到Insta或Amazon Fresh的確切配料+數量。
localize.tagline: 在任何食譜網站上即時查看食譜或訂購食材
